description: gobuilder: use go tool to build and test sub-repositories

messages.text:
PTAL

https://codereview.appspot.com/5576047/diff/1/misc/dashboard/builder/main.go
File misc/dashboard/builder/main.go (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/5576047/diff/1/misc/dashboard/builder/main.go#newcode390
misc/dashboard/builder/main.go:390: // TODO(adg): do this in a GOPATH that is cleaned after each build.
On 2012/01/25 21:35:42, rsc wrote:
> Please add to this CL.
> Or is the idea that you're clobbering a $GOROOT that is temporary anyway?
> If so, remove comment?

Yeah, it's not necessary in this case. It wil be for external packages, which will be run by a separate function.

https://codereview.appspot.com/5576047/diff/1/misc/dashboard/builder/main.go#newcode407
misc/dashboard/builder/main.go:407: // test the package
On 2012/01/25 21:35:42, rsc wrote:
> Is this getting used for non-code.google.com/p/go.* packages?

No.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg

http://codereview.appspot.com/5576047/diff/1/misc/dashboard/builder/main.go

Please add to this CL.
Or is the idea that you're clobbering a $GOROOT that is temporary anyway?
If so, remove comment?
